issue.title: [Docs][Java] Dataset Javadocs are not being published
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15702](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15702). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Javadocs for 7.0.0 don't list org.apache.arrow.dataset: https://arrow.apache.org/docs/java/reference/index.html

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15702?focusedCommentId=17531229) by @toddfarmer:*
I naively attempted to add dataset to the <modules> listing and run mvn site, but this produced the following error:
```java

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-site-plugin:3.5.1:site (default-site) on project arrow-java-root: failed to get report for org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-javadoc-plugin: Failed to execute goal on project arrow-dataset: Could not resolve dependencies for project org.apache.arrow:arrow-dataset:jar:8.0.0-SNAPSHOT: Could not find artifact org.apache.arrow:arrow-c-data:jar:8.0.0-SNAPSHOT in apache.snapshots (https://repository.apache.org/snapshots) -> [Help 1] 
```
Leaving this as a note for later engagement.
